about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We aspire to become the #1 logistics service provider in the market through building and maintaining strong and honest relations with our clients, agents and partners.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do?
whatWeDo.content: Jerusalem Pillars is a logistics, shipping, and transportation company founded in 2014 by a team of professionals who enjoy over 14 years of experience in the field. Our services cover countries all around the world and we run our operations through our head office in Amman, Jordan, as well as our regional office in Istanbul, Turkey. JPLS is an active member of Jordan Logistics Association and an accredited member of Jordan Maritime Commission.

ourValues.title: Our Values
ourValues.content: We believe that honesty, trust, and punctuality are key to success. Applying those traits, not only with our clients, but with our agents and business partners paved the way for us to grow and build more solid business relations.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
missionList: Be your reliable and punctual logistics service provider
Maintain and enhance the quality of our services to cater to all market needs.
Offer top-notch services at competitive prices.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.content: We aspire to become the #1 logistics service provider in the market through building and maintaining strong and honest relations with our clients, agents and partners.

services.title: Services
services.intro: We offer a wide range of services to cater to all your logistic needs

seaFreight.title: Sea Freight
seaFreight.description1: We have a team of experts that will help you getting your goods shipped through best means, be it reefer containers, insulated, open top, flat rack, general purpose container among others. Sea Freight is responsible for over 90% of the total volume of global trade, which makes it the most important forwarding method in the world.
seaFreight.description2: At JPLS we have grown a wide net of relations to offer best quality service for all sorts of shipments starting from raw materials and foodstuff to dangerous goods and many more. We have a team of experts that will help you getting your goods shipped through best means, be it reefer containers, insulated, open top, flat rack, general purpose container among others. Our import and export service varies to cover:
seaFreight.conclusion: Although sea freight is the most renowned method, it is not the safest one, which is why we offer insurance service that you may know more about when you contact us.

airFreight.title: Air Freight
airFreight.description1: All you need to know more is send us an email, call us or pay us a visit.
airFreight.description2: Air freight is the forwarding method with many perks! It is the fastest and safest forwarding method; it offers vast reach, highly reliable arrival and departure times, less need for warehousing, less packaging and more.
airFreight.description3: At JPLS we offer comprehensive import and export freight services through our solid relations with regional and international carriers at the best rates and confirmed space. All you need to know more is send us an email, call us or pay us a visit.

landFreight.title: Land Freight
landFreight.description1: All you need to know more is send us an email, call us or pay us a visit. JPLS specializes in land freight (both import and export) for both local and international trucking, especially in the MENA region, we have our own inventory and great partnership with the most reliable hauler companies to provide you with the best service at the best rates.
landFreight.description2: At JPLS we have grown a wide net of relations to offer best quality service for all sorts of shipments starting from raw materials and foodstuff to dangerous goods and many more. We have a team of experts that will help you getting your goods shipped through best means, be it reefer containers, insulated, open top, flat rack, general purpose container among others.

customClearance.title: Custom Clearance
customClearance.description1: We are an agent in Jordan & Turkey who can fast-track your consignments, giving you the advantage of priority checks and fewer checks
customClearance.description2: our dedicated team for customs clearance takes care of all the documentation, taxes and customs duty making the entire process hassle free for you
customClearance.description3: We  can help minimize delays and enhance efficiency, allowing your products to shipping promptly.

warehousing.title: Warehousing
warehousing.description1: Create a flexible, customized strategy with the refrigerated, frozen, and dry warehousing options you need. Secure space for inventory and trust our experts to support the movement of your products both into and out of the warehouse.
warehousing.description2: Increase your on-time deliveries by positioning your freight in the right locations within our  network of warehouse facilities. Meet your ever-increasing ecommerce demands with custom warehouse supply chain
